Account_Name.description: Specify the company name. This field is mandatory.

Account_Number.description: Specify the reference number for account. Up to 40 characters are allowed in this field.

Account_Site.description: Specify the name of the account’s location, for example, Headquarters or London. Up to 80 characters are allowed in this field.

Account_Type.description: Select the type of account from the drop-down list.

Annual_Revenue.description: Specify the annual revenue of the account.

Billing_City.description: Specify the billing address of the account to send the quotes, invoices, and other agreements.

Billing_Code.description: Specify the billing address of the account to send the quotes, invoices, and other agreements.

Billing_Country.description: Specify the billing address of the account to send the quotes, invoices, and other agreements.

Billing_State.description: Specify the billing address of the account to send the quotes, invoices, and other agreements.

Billing_Street.description: Specify the billing address of the account to send the quotes, invoices, and other agreements.

Created_By.description: Displays name of the user created the Account first time.

email.description: Email of the user created the Account first time

id.description: Id of the user created the Account first time

name.description: Name of the user created the Account first time

Created_Time.description: Created datetime in ISO format: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:SS+TZ_OFFSET

Description.description: Specify any other details about the account.

Employees.description: Specify the number of employees in account's company.

Fax.description: Specify fax number of the account.

Industry.description: Select the type of industry from the drop-down list.

Last_Activity_Time.description: Last user activity datetime in ISO format: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:SS+TZ_OFFSET

Modified_By.description: Displays name of the user modified the Account.

email.description: Email of the user modified the Account.

id.description: Id of the user modified the Account.

name.description: Name of the user modified the Account.

Modified_Time.description: Last modified datetime in ISO format: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:SS+TZ_OFFSET

Owner.description: Select the name of the user to whom the account is assigned.

email.description: The email of the user to whom the account is assigned.

id.description: The id of the user to whom the account is assigned.

name.description: The name of the user to whom the account is assigned.

Ownership.description: Specify the type of ownership of the company from the drop-down list.

Parent_Account.description: Select the parent company name from the Change pop-up dialog.

Phone.description: Specify phone number of the account.

Rating.description: Specify the rating of the account.

Record_Image.description: Undocumented, looks like a binary field

SIC_Code.description: Specify the Standard Industrial Classification code of the account.

Shipping_City.description: Specify the shipping city of the account to deliver the shipment.

Shipping_Code.description: Specify the shipping zip code of the account to deliver the shipment.

Shipping_Country.description: Specify the shipping country of the account to deliver the shipment.

Shipping_State.description: Specify the shipping state of the account to deliver the shipment.

Shipping_Street.description: Specify the shipping street of the account to deliver the shipment.

Ticker_Symbol.description: Specify the ticker symbol of the Company.

Website.description: Specify the URL of the company's Web site.
